Bardzo dobra gra, zespołowa, lecz valve powinien popracować nad dobieraniem drużyn do siebie. Kiedy przez cały czas dostaje się nieogarnięte osoby to aż nie chce się grać i niema przyjemności z rozgrywki.
Jogo é pica, muito divertido e leve

If you enjoy competitive action, then I highly recommend this as a staple game. However if you are more of the casual I type, I suggest you go play something else. The people in this game can be quite salty sometimes for no reason.

Prime ou não, o hack predomina.
spent money on prime, only to scrim with more hackers. for some reason they keep kicking me during games. being new to the game, this is frustrating and probably won't play anymore.

I really enjoyed the game. I'm not the competitive type, so I almost always played casual. Or the other non-comp gamemodes. But, I'm not sure when, they eventually changed official casual from 10v10 to 5v5 like comp. I'm just not interested. If I wanted to play comp, I'd just play comp.

Now sure, there's unofficial servers. But they differ drastically. The game just isn't the same as what I bought. So time to move on.

If that doesn't bother you, then you'll probably find the game enjoyable. I hear there's cheaters galore, but I usually don't play comp so I wouldn't know. Not that they're only in comp.
